alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Northwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:01PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL MENDOCINO AND NORTHWESTERN LAKE COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM PDT... At 600 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Fouts Springs, or 13 miles north of Upper Lake, moving northwest at 20 mph towards the Lake Pillsbury and Gravelly Valley Airport area. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gravelly Valley Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Northwestern Mendocino Interior
